attributes.action: Give us a simple IN or OUT vote in a referendum on our continued membership of the EU
attributes.additional_details: The total number of votes on the combined 'Get us out' referenda on the website is 94,842 (which will, of course, include duplicates).  This represents less than 0.16% of the population of this country.  It would appear, from the lack of response/interest, that you might be right that there is no groundswell for us to get out of the EU.  WHY DO YOU STILL REFUSE TO GIVE US THE OPPORTUNITY TO DETERMINE OUR OWN FUTURE?
